title: Fire Storm
description: What would you do if you knew that a TEOTWAWKI scenario was imminent? Are there any lines that you would not cross?Former Delta Operator Captain John ‘Ice’ McGinnon gets word of a global disaster from his father, based at the Pentagon, and together with his team spring into action to save those closest to them.Dr. Savannah ‘Van’ Fastbender was in the right place, at the right time. Lucky enough to have been visiting her friend, and a member of Ice’s Delta Team, when he was made aware of the disaster the world was about to face.Working together to save as many family and friends, Ice and Van have to make some hard decisions and break some rules to ensure everyone’s survival.Can they get everything ready in time? Or will it be too late? And how will they deal with their growing attraction?
author: Jax Farr
